name: QuickBooks 2005 File
summary: Learn about .QB2005 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: QB2005 files are not used for newer versions of QuickBooks and are considered legacy.

description: Company accounting data file created by the Mac version of QuickBooks, a small business money management application; stores company income and expense information; used for tracking financial data, as well as for filing taxes and managing payroll.
